text: The Best of Nudimension is a greatest hits album that contains most songs by 1980s French Canadian synthpop group Nudimension that were recorded between 1981 and 1989.Encyclopedia of Canadian rock, pop and folk music by Rick Jackson, (Kingston, ON: Quarry Press, (1994) () All songs on the album are in French or English. Nudimension stopped recording in about 1991. The album is a remaster and re-release that was released by Musi-Video Records (Canada) in July 2009, and produced by Marc Fontaine, who was a member of the band. ==Track listing== # "Amour Programmé" (Fontaine, Rondeau) – 4:11 # "Another Broken Heart" – 4:04 # "Automatique" – 3:56 # "Big Boy" – 3:40 # "Femme En Amour" – 4:28 # "Hors La Loi" (Louie Louie version) – 4:17 # "Hors La Loi (Anne-Marie Cyr version) – 3:47 # "Hot Pursuit (instrumental" – 2:50 # "Mondo Erotico (instrumental)" – 5:01 # "Model Blues (instrumental" – 4:06 # "Nudimension Theme Song" – 3:11 # "I Need Your Loving" – 6:59 # "Planête Sauvage" – 3:40 # "Petite Fille" – 4:59 # "Reminiscing" – 3:01 # "Rendez-vous" – 3:41 # "Save a Little Love" – 4:18 # "Amour Programmé (instrumental)" – 6:05 # "Femme En Amour (instrumental)" – 4:59 # "I Need Your Loving (instrumental" – 8:22 Album Notes The song was released as a single in 1983. ==Credits== *Patrick Bourgeois – electric guitar *Anne-Marie Cyr: vocals *Francois Laberge: synthesizer *Laurie Ann Gill – vocals *Louie Louie (real name Louis Rondeau): vocals, drums, keyboards *Marla – Vocals ==References== ==Other websites== *Nudimension Article and recent interview (in French) Category:Greatest hits albums Category:Compilation albums
title: The Best of Nudimension
